ee:variables.ee:set-variable: #[ %dw 2.0 output application/json --- " SELECT top " ++ vars.maxRecords as String ++ " CustomerAccountNumber, OwnerContactID, AccountTierLevelCode, AccountTierLevelDesc, FreezeCode, FreezeDesc, " ++ " AccountTypeCode, AccountTypeDescription, AccountCategoryCode, AccountCategoryDescription, AdminOfficerContactID, " ++ " AdministratorName, ActiveFlag, ClosedFlag, CustomerDescriptionLine1, CustomerDescriptionLine2, CustomerDescriptionLine3, CustomerDescriptionLine4, StatementVsValidFrom_difference, " ++ " FORMAT(DateOpened, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS DateOpened, " ++ " FORMAT(ClosedDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS ClosedDate, " ++ " FORMAT(StatementDateTime, 'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffZ') AS StatementDateTime " ++ " FORMAT(ValidFrom, 'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffZ') AS ValidFrom " ++ " FROM account " ++ " WHERE ValidFrom > :validFrom " ]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere" --- payload map (item, value) ->{ account: item.CustomerAccountNumber as String, contactId: item.OwnerContactID, tierLevelCode: item.AccountTierLevelCode, tribeDescription: item.AccountTierLevelDesc, freezeCode: item.FreezeCode, freezeDescription: item.FreezeDesc, typeCode: item.AccountTypeCode, typeDescription: item.AccountTypeDescription, categoryCode: item.AccountCategoryCode, categoryDescription: item.AccountCategoryDescription, adminOfficerId: item.AdminOfficerContactID, adminOfficerName: item.AdministratorName, activeFlag: item.ActiveFlag, openedDate: item.DateOpened, closedDate: item.ClosedDate, closedFlag: item.ClosedFlag, line1: item.CustomerDescriptionLine1, line2: item.CustomerDescriptionLine2, line3: item.CustomerDescriptionLine3, line4: item.CustomerDescriptionLine4, date: item.ValidFrom, statementDate: item.StatementDateTime }
